    Run cause-specific forecasts

    CombinedForecast.Rd

    A wrapper that runs the forecast for each cause and groups the outputs together.

    CombinedForecast(
  data,
  forecast_params,
  n_years = 2060 - 2016,
  folder_path = getwd()
)

    Arguments

    data

    Data table containing our processed cause-specific mortality rates

    forecast_params

    Data table containing the control parameters for the cause specific forecasts

    n_years

    Integer - the number of years to forecast into the future

    folder_path

    where to save the outputs - defaults to the current working directory

    Value

    mx_data_cause

    Data table containing the observed and forecast mortality rates by age, sex, IMD quintile and cause.

    mx_data_all

    Data table containing the observed and forecast mortality rates for all causes combined.

    Examples

    
if (FALSE) {

cforecast <- CombinedForecast(
  data = fread("tob_death_rates_national_2019-05-06_mort.tools_1.0.0.csv"),
  forecast_params = setDT(readxl::read_xlsx("disease specific mortality forecasting (for function input).xlsx"))
)

}
